Pipe’s sealed at ends during until fit off
Insulation fitted to pipe and sealed at joints

Drain lines run inside room to nominated tundish location

Indoor units mounted, fitted off and refrigerant pipes and drains connected with supports. check current construction issue drawing for correct location and heights
Check for damage after insall of indoor unit

Check for damage after insall of outdoor unit

Stop valves released and extra refrigerant added
System powered up, test run and operation complete- communication to be addressed and
